—A look into the two-year process imagining, designing, and developing BASIC’s new HQ in Makers Quarter, San Diego, California.

Click & Hold to enter
MOVES®

INTRO

00:01:07

NEW
BASIC HQ.
SD-CA
32.7134° N,
117.1497° W
Since we founded the company, one of our goals was to create a culture and an environment that enables our people to do the best work of their lives. Our new office plays a critical part in continuing to live out that goal. As a company that takes pride in building brands that matter in culture, we wanted to position ourselves within an area we feel our brand could thrive and live by example. We felt that the city of San Diego needed an identity and a community where like-minded individuals could come together. To us, MQ can become this and is the best place for an agency like ours to call home.
BASIC / MOVES® SAN DIEGO - CA (END INTRO)
